page.title: 04Favourite Hobbies
page.content: My favourite hobby is FISHING. I have two rods for catching fish and two reels. The earliest I have ever got up to go fishing is 4.00am. We arrived at the canal at 4.20am, but I didn't catch any fish until 5.15am. I caught 12 fish, mostly Eels and Bream, but we didn't take them home because we don't like to eat them. I often go CLAY PIDGEON SHOOTING at a field in Boughton, it is very interesting. A man opens a trap door when you shout "pull", then an orange disc flies into the air. You fire at this with a gun and hope to hit it! Sometimes I go TRAIN SPOTTING - I look closely at the train numbers and record them. I usually go to Crewe Station, my favourite train is the 50.29XE RENOWN. Compiled from work by 1A.
